title: Safiya Zaghloul glass plate negatives
description: Glass plate negatives of Egyptian political activist Safiya Zaghloul from the Mostafa Amin Collection. Zaghloul, known as the "Mother of the Egyptians" (أم المصريين), was a leader of the Wafd party, and wife of Egyptian revolutionary and politician Saad Zaghloul. The photos may have been taken in the mid-1930s.
subject: Zaghloul, Safia, 1876-1946
rights: Copyright the American University in Cairo, 2019
repository: Rare Books and Special Collections Digital Library
